    • insert

      public boolean insert(Product product)
      Method that inserts the new product in the table if it is validated by the product validator and displays an error message otherwise, with the help of the productDAO class.
      Parameters:
      product - represents the Product instance that needs to be inserted in the table.
      Returns:
      true if product was inserted successfully, false otherwise.

    • update

      public boolean update(Product product)
      Method that uses the ProductDAO class to update a product's values in the product table.
      Parameters:
      product - the instance containing the values that need to be updated.
      Returns:
      true if the Data was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • delete

      public boolean delete(String id)
      Method that uses the ProductDAO class to delete a row form the table Product in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the instance that needs to be deleted from the table.
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully, false otherwise.
